title: Hillbilly Elegy
plot: An urgent phone call pulls a Yale Law student back to his Ohio hometown, where he reflects on three generations of family history and his own future.

title: Harrow
plot: Harrow tells the story of Dr. Daniel Harrow, a forensic pathologist with a total disregard for authority.

title: Son
plot: When a young boy contracts a mysterious illness, his mother must decide how far she will go to protect him from terrifying forces in her past.

title: Little Fires Everywhere
plot: Based on Celeste Ng's 2017 bestseller, "Little Fires Everywhere" follows the intertwined fates of the picture-perfect Richardson family and the enigmatic mother and daughter who upend their lives.

title: Coven
plot: Basque Country, 1609. The men of the region are at sea and Amaia takes part for the first time in the nightly dances in the woods with the other villager girls. She is only 20. At dawn, they are all arrested.

title: Solar Opposites
plot: A family of aliens move to middle America, where they debate whether life is better there or on their home planet.

title: Goliath
plot: A disgraced lawyer, now an ambulance chaser, gets a case that could bring him redemption or at least revenge on the firm which expelled him.

title: Ex Machina
plot: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.

title: Ladies in Black
plot: Adapted from the bestselling novel by Madeleine St John, Ladies in Black is an alluring and tender-hearted comedy drama about the lives of a group of department store employees in 1959 Sydney.

title: The Big Short
plot: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the US mortgage market. In their research they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

title: Atlanta
plot: Based in Atlanta, Earn and his cousin Alfred try to make their way in the world through the rap scene. Along the way they come face to face with social and economic issues touching on race, relationships, poverty, status, and parenthood.

title: Fargo
plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

title: Dollface
plot: After breaking up with her longtime boyfriend, a woman tries to reconnect with the friends she lost during the relationship.

title: Luther
plot: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: The Seven Deadly Sins
plot: The legend of the confrontation between the Seven Deadly Sins and the Holy Knights.

title: War Dogs
plot: Loosely based on the true story of two young men, David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli, who won a three hundred million dollar contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan.

title: I'm Thinking of Ending Things
plot: Full of misgivings, a young woman travels with her new boyfriend to his parents' secluded farm. Upon arriving, she comes to question everything she thought she knew about him, and herself.

title: Eyes Wide Shut
plot: A New York City doctor embarks on a harrowing, night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife reveals a painful secret to him.

title: The Great Gatsby
plot: A writer and wall street trader, Nick, finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor, Jay Gatsby.

title: The Devil's Advocate
plot: An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

title: 30 Rock
plot: Liz Lemon (Tina Fey), head writer of the sketch comedy show "TGS with Tracy Jordan", must deal with an arrogant new boss and a crazy new star, all while trying to run a successful television show without losing her mind.

title: Capone
plot: The 47-year old Al Capone, after 10 years in prison, starts suffering from dementia and comes to be haunted by his violent past.

title: Alien: Covenant
plot: The crew of a colony ship, bound for a remote planet, discover an uncharted paradise with a threat beyond their imagination, and must attempt a harrowing escape.

title: The Girl on the Train
plot: A divorcee becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation that promises to send shockwaves throughout her life.

title: Year One
plot: After being banished from their tribe, two hunter-gatherers encounter Biblical characters and eventually wind up in the city of Sodom.

title: SpongeBob SquarePants
plot: The misadventures of a talking sea sponge who works at a fast food restaurant, attends a boating school, and lives in an underwater pineapple.

title: Burn Notice
plot: A spy recently disavowed by the U.S. government uses his special ops training to help others in trouble.

title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
plot: As Scott Lang balances being both a superhero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.
King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

title: Weeds
plot: When a suburban mother turns to dealing marijuana in order to maintain her privileged lifestyle after her husband dies, she finds out just how addicted her entire neighborhood already is.

title: The Conjuring
plot: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

title: Oblivion
plot: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.

title: Cheers
plot: The regulars of the Boston bar "Cheers" share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.

title: A Quiet Place
plot: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

title: Silicon Valley
plot: Follows the struggle of Richard Hendricks, a Silicon Valley engineer trying to build his own company called Pied Piper.

title: Our Idiot Brother
plot: A comedy centered on an idealist who barges into the lives of his three sisters.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
plot: Two brothers search for a Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their deceased mother goes awry and leaves them in damaged physical forms.

title: X-Men: Dark Phoenix
plot: Jean Grey begins to develop incredible powers that corrupt and turn her into a Dark Phoenix, causing the X-Men to decide if her life is worth more than all of humanity.

title: The Wilds
plot: A group of teens must survive after a crash leaves them stranded. There's just one twist to this thrilling drama - these girls did not end up on this island by accident.

title: Sense8
plot: A group of people around the world are suddenly linked mentally, and must find a way to survive being hunted by those who see them as a threat to the world's order.

title: Twister
plot: Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.

title: Re: Zero, Starting Life in Another World
plot: Shortly after being summoned to a new world, Subaru Natsuki and his new female companion are brutally murdered. But then he awakes to find himself in the same alley, with the same thugs, the same girl, and the day begins to repeat.

title: Lucky
plot: A suburban woman fights to be believed as she finds herself stalked by a threatening figure who returns to her house night after night. When she can't get help from those around her, she is forced to take matters into her own hands.

title: Dolemite Is My Name
plot: Eddie Murphy  portrays real-life legend  Rudy Ray Moore , a comedy and rap pioneer who proved naysayers wrong when his hilarious, obscene, kung-fu fighting alter ego, Dolemite, became a 1970s Blaxploitation phenomenon.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
plot: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

title: Avatar 2
plot: A sequel to  Avatar  (2009).

title: Skins
plot: The story of a group of British teens who are trying to grow up and find love and happiness despite questionable parenting and teachers who more want to be friends (and lovers) rather than authority figures.

title: Justice Society: World War II
plot: The Justice Society of America , a group of heroes aiding the allies in World War 2, acquire an ally from the future who sends them on an adventure that changes history.

title: The Girl Next Door
plot: A teenager's dreams come true when a former porn star moves in next door and they fall in love.

title: Doctor Sleep
plot: Years following the events of  The Shining  (1980), a now-adult Dan Torrance must protect a young girl with similar powers from a cult known as The True Knot, who prey on children with powers to remain immortal.

title: Romeo + Juliet
plot: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

title: Something Borrowed
plot: Friendships are tested and secrets come to the surface when terminally single Rachel falls for Dex, her best friend Darcy's fiancé.

title: American Pie
plot: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
plot: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.

title: Baywatch
plot: Devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon butts heads with a brash new recruit, as they uncover a criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay.

title: The Mummy
plot: At an archaeological dig in the ancient city of Hamunaptra, an American serving in the French Foreign Legion accidentally awakens a mummy who begins to wreak havoc as he searches for the reincarnation of his long-lost love.

title: There Will Be Blood
plot: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

title: Uncharted
plot: The story is a prequel to the games, starring Holland as a younger Drake, showing us details of how he came to meet and befriend Sully.

title: The Intouchables
plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

title: Prometheus
plot: Following clues to the origin of mankind, a team finds a structure on a distant moon, but they soon realize they are not alone.

title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
plot: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their original glory.

title: Unorthodox
plot: Story of a young ultra-Orthodox Jewish woman who flees her arranged marriage and religious community to start a new life abroad.

title: Portrait of a Lady on Fire
plot: On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the eighteenth century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait of a young woman.

title: The Twilight Zone
plot: Ordinary people find themselves in extraordinarily astounding situations, which they each try to solve in a remarkable manner.

title: We Can Be Heroes
plot: When alien invaders capture the Earth's superheroes, their kids must learn to work together to save their parents- and the planet.

title: Ammonite
plot: 1840s England, acclaimed but overlooked fossil hunter Mary Anning and a young woman sent to convalesce by the sea develop an intense relationship, altering both of their lives forever.

title: Spirited Away
plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

title: Trainspotting
plot: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
plot: During an adventure into the criminal underworld, Han Solo meets his future co-pilot Chewbacca and encounters Lando Calrissian years before joining the Rebellion.

title: Remember Me
plot: A romantic drama centered on two new lovers: Tyler, whose parents have split in the wake of his brother's suicide, and Ally, who lives each day to the fullest since witnessing her mother's murder.

title: Into the Wild
plot: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

title: Outer Banks
plot: A group of teenagers from the wrong side of the tracks stumble upon a treasure map that unearths a long buried secret.

title: Gomorrah
plot: Ciro disregards tradition in his attempt to become the next boss of his crime syndicate. The internal power struggle puts him and his entire family's life at risk.

title: The Closer
plot: Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive cases.

title: The Blue Lagoon
plot: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.

title: Starship Troopers
plot: Humans in a fascist, militaristic future wage war with giant alien bugs.

title: The Maze Runner
plot: Thomas is deposited in a community of boys after his memory is erased, soon learning they're all trapped in a maze that will require him to join forces with fellow "runners" for a shot at escape.

title: Jane the Virgin
plot: A young, devout Catholic woman discovers that she was accidentally artificially inseminated.

title: I May Destroy You
plot: The question of sexual consent in contemporary life and how, in the new landscape of dating and relationships, we make the distinction between liberation and exploitation.

title: Point Break
plot: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

title: A Beautiful Mind
plot: After  John Nash , a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

title: Defending Jacob
plot: The limited drama series is a gripping, character-driven thriller based on the 2012 New York Times best selling novel of the same name by William Landay. An assistant DA's world is shattered when his beloved son gets charged with murder.

title: The Big Lebowski
plot: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

title: The Midnight Sky
plot: This post-apocalyptic tale follows Augustine, a lonely scientist in the Arctic, as he races to stop Sully and her fellow astronauts from returning home to a mysterious global catastrophe.

title: The Lion King
plot: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: The Fosters
plot: Teenager Callie Jacob is placed in a foster home with a lesbian couple and their blend of biological, adoptive, and foster children.

title: Are You Afraid of the Dark?
plot: An anthology series that follows different chapters of the Midnight Society, a group of teenagers who gather at midnight to tell scary stories, such as the Carnival of Doom and the Curse of the Shadows.

title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
plot: The lives of the kids at Degrassi Community School dealing with the serious and sometimes taboo issues that plague teenagers.

title: The Outsiders
plot: The rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, only heats up when one gang member kills a member of the other.

title: Gangs of London
plot: Tells the story of London being torn apart by the turbulent power struggles of its international gangs and the sudden power vacuum that's created when the head of London's most powerful crime family is assassinated.

title: National Lampoon's Animal House
plot: At a 1962 college, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.

title: Horrible Bosses
plot: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.

title: A Cure for Wellness
plot: An ambitious young executive is sent to retrieve his company's CEO from an idyllic but mysterious "wellness center" at a remote location in the Swiss Alps, but soon suspects that the spa's treatments are not what they seem.

title: Kids
plot: A day in the life of a group of teens as they travel around New York City skating, drinking, smoking and deflowering virgins.

title: Taboo
plot: Adventurer James Keziah Delaney returns to London during the War of 1812 to rebuild his late father's shipping empire. However, both the government and his biggest competitor want his inheritance at any cost - even murder.

title: Hellboy
plot: Based on the graphic novels by Mike Mignola, Hellboy, caught between the worlds of the supernatural and human, battles an ancient sorceress bent on revenge.

title: Murder on the Orient Express
plot: When a murder occurs on the train on which he's travelling, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case.

title: Dead Poets Society
plot: Maverick teacher John Keating uses poetry to embolden his boarding school students to new heights of self-expression.

title: Hook
plot: When Captain James Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

title: Sorry for Your Loss
plot: Her husband's sudden death upends and transforms relationships in Leigh Shaw's life and also forces her to realize how much she didn't know about him.

title: Rome
plot: A down-to-earth account of the lives of both illustrious and ordinary Romans set in the last days of the Roman Republic.

title: New Tricks
plot: Three retired police officers are drafted in to solve cold cases, with a touch of comedy and drama

title: Crazy About Her
plot: After a magical night together, Adri voluntarily turns himself into the psychiatric institution where Carla lives.

title: Safe Haven
plot: A young woman with a mysterious past lands in Southport, North Carolina where her bond with a widower forces her to confront the dark secret that haunts her.

title: Derry Girls
plot: The personal exploits of a 16-year-old girl and her family and friends during the Troubles in the early 1990s.

title: Citizen Kane
plot: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.

title: Spider-Man
plot: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.

title: Ready or Not
plot: A bride's wedding night takes a sinister turn when her eccentric new in-laws force her to take part in a terrifying game.

title: Carnival Row
plot: A human detective and a fairy rekindle a dangerous affair in a Victorian fantasy world, where the city's uneasy peace collapses when a string of murders reveals an unimaginable monster.

title: Underwater
plot: A crew of oceanic researchers working for a deep sea drilling company try to get to safety after a mysterious earthquake devastates their deepwater research and drilling facility located at the bottom of the Mariana Trench.

title: The Usual Suspects
plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

title: Hart of Dixie
plot: New Yorker and new doctor Zoe Hart accepts an offer from a stranger, Dr. Harley Wilkes, to work in his medical practice in Bluebell, Alabama. She arrives to find he has died and left half the practice to her in his will.

title: Reservoir Dogs
plot: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
plot: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs, and rock n' roll.

title: Aladdin
plot: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

title: The Courier
plot: Cold War spy Greville Wynne and his Russian source try to put an end to the Cuban Missile Crisis.

title: Home Movie: The Princess Bride
plot: Serialized remake of 'The Princess Bride' told in short chapters featuring celebrities at home during quarantine.

title: Run Hide Fight
plot: 17-year-old Zoe Hull uses her wits, survival skills, and compassion to fight for her life, and those of her fellow classmates, against a group of live-streaming school shooters.

title: No Good Deed
plot: An unstable escaped convict terrorizes a woman who is alone with her two children.

title: Finding 'Ohana
plot: A summer in rural O‘ahu takes an exciting turn for two Brooklyn-raised siblings when a journal pointing to long-lost treasure sets them on an epic adventure with new friends, and leads them to reconnect with their Hawaiian heritage.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
plot: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

title: Jurassic World: Dominion
plot: Plot kept under wraps.

title: The Strain
plot: A mysterious viral outbreak with hallmarks of an ancient and evil strain of vampirism ravages the city of New York.

title: Black-ish
plot: A family man struggles to gain a sense of cultural identity while raising his kids in a predominantly white, upper-middle-class neighborhood.

title: The Girl Next Door
plot: Follows the unspeakable torture and abuses committed on a teenage girl in the care of her aunt and the boys who witness and fail to report the crime.

title: The Truman Show
plot: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

title: The Notebook
plot: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.

title: 10 Things I Hate About You
plot: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
plot: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.

title: Pacific Rim
plot: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

title: Ocean's Eleven
plot: Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

title: Saint Maud
plot: Follows a pious nurse who becomes dangerously obsessed with saving the soul of her dying patient.

title: Hunters
plot: In 1977, in New York City, a troubled young Jewish man bent on revenge is taken in by a secret group of Nazi hunters fighting a clandestine war against the cabal of high-ranking Nazi officials in hiding who work to create the Fourth Reich.

title: The Haunting of Bly Manor
plot: After an au pair’s tragic death, Henry hires a young American nanny to care for his orphaned niece and nephew who reside at Bly Manor with the chef Owen, groundskeeper Jamie and housekeeper, Mrs. Grose.

title: A Teacher
plot: A Teacher explores the complexities and consequences of a predatory relationship between Claire Wilson, a young teacher at a suburban Texas high school and her student, Eric Walker.

title: The Alienist: Angel of Darkness
plot: Newspaper illustrator John Moore meets with criminal psychologist (alienist) Dr. Laszlo Kreizler to investigate a serial killer in New York during the late 19th century.

title: Elementary
plot: A modern take on the cases of Sherlock Holmes, with the detective now living in New York City.

title: The Shield
plot: Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.

title: Psycho
plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

title: Black Swan
plot: A committed dancer struggles to maintain her sanity after winning the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake".

title: Legion
plot: When a group of strangers at a dusty roadside diner come under attack by demonic forces, their only chance for survival lies with an archangel named Michael, who informs a pregnant waitress that her unborn child is humanity's last hope.

title: Possessor
plot: Possessor follows an agent who works for a secretive organization that uses brain-implant technology to inhabit other people's bodies - ultimately driving them to commit assassinations for high-paying clients.

title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
plot: An introvert freshman is taken under the wings of two seniors who welcome him to the real world.

title: The Many Saints of Newark
plot: A look at the formative years of New Jersey gangster, Tony Soprano.

title: Lost in Space
plot: After crash-landing on an alien planet, the Robinson family fight against all odds to survive and escape, but they're surrounded by hidden dangers.

title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
plot: This series focuses on the NYPD's Major Case Squad, a force of detectives who investigate high-profile cases, whilst also showing parts of the crime from the criminal's point of view to the audience.

title: The Devil Wears Prada
plot: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.

title: Memento
plot: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

title: Blended
plot: After a bad blind date, a man and woman find themselves stuck together at a resort for families, where their attraction grows as their respective kids benefit from the burgeoning relationship.

title: Iron Fist
plot: A young man is bestowed with incredible martial arts skills and a mystical force known as the Iron Fist.

title: Dune
plot: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

title: Heroes
plot: Common people discover that they have super powers. Their lives intertwine as a devastating event must be prevented.

title: Oldboy
plot: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
plot: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

title: Mary Queen of Scots
plot: Mary Stuart's (Saoirse Ronan's) attempt to overthrow her cousin Elizabeth I (Margot Robbie), Queen of England, finds her condemned to years of imprisonment before facing execution.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

title: After We Fell
plot: Just as Tessa makes the biggest decision of her life, everything changes. Revelations about her family, and then Hardin's, throw everything they knew before in doubt and makes their hard-won future together more difficult to claim.

title: Russian Doll
plot: A cynical young woman in New York City keeps dying and returning to the party that's being thrown in her honor on that same evening. She tries to find a way out of this strange time loop.

title: My Salinger Year
plot: A college grad takes a clerical job working for the literary agent of the renowned, reclusive writer J.D. Salinger.

title: Catch Me If You Can
plot: Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

title: Die Another Day
plot: James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul, who is funding the development of an international space weapon.

title: There's Something About Mary
plot: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

title: Jessica Jones
plot: Following the tragic end of her brief superhero career, Jessica Jones tries to rebuild her life as a private investigator, dealing with cases involving people with remarkable abilities in New York City.

title: Stargate
plot: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
plot: Captain Jack Sparrow is pursued by old rival Captain Salazar and a crew of deadly ghosts who have escaped from the Devil's Triangle. They're determined to kill every pirate at sea...notably Jack.

title: Veronica Mars
plot: After her best friend is murdered, and her father is removed as county Sheriff, Veronica Mars dedicates her life to cracking the toughest mysteries in the affluent town of Neptune.

title: The Hunt
plot: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

title: Power
plot: James "Ghost" St. Patrick, a wealthy New York night club owner who has it all, catering to the city's elite and dreaming big, lives a double life as a drug kingpin.

title: The Night Of
plot: After a night of partying with a woman he picked up, a man wakes up to find her stabbed to death and is charged with her murder.

title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
plot: In the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin participate in a joint mission against a mysterious criminal organization, which is working to proliferate nuclear weapons.

title: Donnie Darko
plot: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

title: The Hateful Eight
plot: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

title: Atypical
plot: Sam, an 18-year-old on the autism spectrum, decides it's time to find a girlfriend, a journey that sets Sam's mom on her own life-changing path as her son seeks more independence.

title: Jurassic World
plot: A new theme park, built on the original site of Jurassic Park, creates a genetically modified hybrid dinosaur, the Indominus Rex, which escapes containment and goes on a killing spree.

title: The Stand
plot: After a deadly plague kills most of the world's population, the remaining survivors split into two groups - one led by a benevolent elder and the other by a malevolent being - to face each other in a final battle between good and evil.

title: Top Class: The Life and Times of the Sierra Canyon Trailblazers
plot: Top Class follows a new mecca of high school athletics, nestled just outside of Los Angeles. The back-to-back state champion Sierra Canyon Trailblazers exploded onto basketball's national ...                 See full summary  »

title: To All the Boys: Always and Forever
plot: Senior year of high school takes center stage as Lara Jean returns from a family trip to Korea and considers her college plans - with and without Peter.

title: Billie Eilish: The World's a Little Blurry
plot: An intimate look at the singer-songwriter's journey, navigating life on the road, on stage, and at home, while creating her debut album.

title: Atomic Blonde
plot: An undercover MI6 agent is sent to Berlin during the Cold War to investigate the murder of a fellow agent and recover a missing list of double agents.

title: Inside Man
plot: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

title: Twin Peaks
plot: Picks up 25 years after the inhabitants of a quaint northwestern town are stunned when their homecoming queen is murdered.

title: Mortal Kombat
plot: Three unknowing martial artists are summoned to a mysterious island to compete in a tournament whose outcome will decide the fate of the world.

title: Lolita
plot: An English professor falls for a minor , and has to face the consequences of his actions.

title: Murder by Death
plot: Five famous literary detective characters and their sidekicks are invited to a bizarre mansion to solve an even stranger mystery.

title: Molly's Game
plot: The true story of Molly Bloom, an Olympic-class skier who ran the world's most exclusive high-stakes poker game and became an FBI target.

title: Dealer
plot: A music video director tries to film Tony, a charismatic but unpredictable drug gang leader wanting to break into the rap music scene. His work reveals the hidden, true face of drug dealing, while he gets caught in a bloody gang war.

title: Love Actually
plot: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

title: Ms. Marvel
plot: New Jersey raised Kamala Khan learns she has polymorphous powers.

title: Blindspot
plot: Jane Doe is found in Times Square with no memory and mysterious tattoos on her body.

title: Bill & Ted Face the Music
plot: Once told they'd save the universe during a time-traveling adventure, 2 would-be rockers from San Dimas, California find themselves as middle-aged dads still trying to crank out a hit song and fulfill their destiny.

title: Call Me Kat
plot: A 39-year-old woman decides to use the money her parents had been saving for her wedding to open a cat-themed cafe.

title: The King
plot: Hal, wayward prince and heir to the English throne, is crowned King Henry V after his tyrannical father dies. Now the young king must navigate palace politics, the war his father left behind, and the emotional strings of his past life.

title: Agent Carter
plot: In 1946, Peggy Carter is relegated to secretarial duties in the Strategic Scientific Reserve (SSR). When Howard Stark is accused of treason, he secretly recruits Peggy to clear his name with the help of his butler, Edwin Jarvis.

title: The King of Queens
plot: Delivery man Doug Heffernan has a good life: He has a pretty wife (Carrie), a big television, and friends with which to watch it. Then Carrie's goofy and annoying father Arthur moves in with them.

title: Alice in Borderland
plot: A group of bored delinquents are transported to a parallel wasteland as part of a survival game.

title: Contagion
plot: Healthcare professionals, government officials and everyday people find themselves in the midst of a pandemic as the CDC works to find a cure.

title: Shadowhunters
plot: After her mother disappears, Clary must venture into the dark world of demon hunting, and embrace her new role among the Shadowhunters.

title: The Love Boat
plot: The romantic and comic tales of the passengers and crew of the cruise ship, Pacific Princess.

title: The Favourite
plot: In early 18th-century England, the status quo at the court is upset when a new servant arrives and endears herself to a frail Queen Anne.

title: Pretty in Pink
plot: A poor girl must choose between the affections of dating her childhood sweetheart or a rich but sensitive playboy.

title: Coco
plot: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

title: 3:10 to Yuma
plot: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

title: Heels
plot: Two brothers and rivals - one a villain, or "heel," in the ring; the other a hero, or "face," war over their late father's wrestling promotion, vying for national attention in small-town Georgia.

title: Nocturnal Animals
plot: A wealthy art gallery owner is haunted by her ex-husband's novel, a violent thriller she interprets as a symbolic revenge tale.

title: Legion
plot: David Haller is a troubled young man diagnosed as schizophrenic, but after a strange encounter, he discovers special powers that will change his life forever.

title: Sharp Objects
plot: A reporter confronts the psychological demons from her past when she returns to her hometown to cover a violent murder.

title: X-Men: First Class
plot: In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them.

title: Major Crimes
plot: The Closer (2005) spin-off series, which follows Captain Raydor of the Los Angeles Police Department.

title: Why Women Kill
plot: An anthology series that follows three women in different decades all living in the same house, as they deal with infidelity and betrayals in their marriages.

title: Wrong Turn
plot: Chris and a group of five friends are left stranded deep in the middle of the woods after their cars collide. As they venture deeper into the woods, they face an uncertain and bloodcurdling fate.

title: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent
plot: A cash-strapped Nicolas Cage agrees to make a paid appearance at a billionaire super fan's birthday party, but is really an informant for the CIA since the billionaire fan is a drug kingpin and gets cast in a Tarantino movie.

title: American History X
plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

title: All Creatures Great and Small
plot: The numerous adventures of a friendly staff at a country veterinarian practice in 1930s to 1940s Yorkshire.

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
plot: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

title: Zodiac
plot: In the late 1960s/early 1970s, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

title: S.W.A.T.
plot: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody, and only the L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

title: La La Land
plot: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

title: Youngblood
plot: A 17 year old farm boy is offered an ice hockey tryout. His brother drives him to Canada. He has fast legs, slow fists, but is chosen. Will he learn to use his fists and play ice hockey the Canuck way? Will he get the coach's cute daughter?

title: Beverly Hills, 90210
plot: A group of friends living in Beverly Hills, California make their way through life from their school days into adulthood.

title: The Impossible
plot: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

title: Boogie Nights
plot: Back when sex was safe, pleasure was a business and business was booming, an idealistic porn producer aspires to elevate his craft to an art when he discovers a hot young talent.

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
plot: Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard.

title: X-Men
plot: In a world where mutants (evolved super-powered humans) exist and are discriminated against, two groups form for an inevitable clash: the supremacist Brotherhood, and the pacifist X-Men.

title: Don't Worry Darling
plot: A 1950's housewife living with her husband in a utopian experimental community begins to worry that his glamorous company may be hiding disturbing secrets.

title: Casino Royale
plot: After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.

title: School of Rock
plot: After being kicked out of his rock band, Dewey Finn becomes a substitute teacher of an uptight elementary private school, only to try and turn his class into a rock band.

title: Die Hard
plot: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

title: Predator
plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

title: Les Misérables
plot: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.

title: Biggie: I Got a Story to Tell
plot: This documentary features rare footage filmed by Christopher Wallace's best friend, Damion "D-Roc" Butler, and interviews with his closest friends and family, revealing a side of Biggie Smalls that the world never knew.

title: Now You See Me
plot: An F.B.I. Agent and an Interpol Detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances, and reward their audiences with the money.

title: Grown Ups
plot: After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend.

title: Merlin
plot: These are the brand new adventures of Merlin, the legendary sorcerer as a young man, when he was just a servant to young Prince Arthur on the royal court of Camelot, who has soon become his best friend, and turned Arthur into a great king and a legend.

title: The Good Wife
plot: Alicia Florrick (Julianna Margulies) has been a good wife to her husband, a former state's attorney. After a very humiliating sex and corruption scandal, he is behind bars. She must now provide for her family and returns to work as a litigator in a law firm.

title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
plot: A streetwise, poor young man from Philadelphia is sent by his mother to live with his aunt, uncle and cousins in their Bel-Air mansion.

title: Small Axe
plot: Small Axe is based on the real-life experiences of London's West Indian community and is set between 1969 and 1982.

title: Extraction
plot: Tyler Rake, a fearless black market mercenary, embarks on the most deadly extraction of his career when he's enlisted to rescue the kidnapped son of an imprisoned international crime lord.

title: Rebecca
plot: A young newlywed arrives at her husband's imposing family estate on a windswept English coast and finds herself battling the shadow of his first wife, Rebecca, whose legacy lives on in the house long after her death.

title: Frozen
plot: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

title: Upload
plot: A man is able to choose his own afterlife after his untimely death by having his consciousness uploaded into a virtual world. As he gets used to his new life and befriends his angel (real world handler) questions about his death arise.

title: Highlander
plot: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".

title: Widows
plot: Four women with nothing in common except a debt left behind by their dead husbands' criminal activities take fate into their own hands and conspire to forge a future on their own terms.

title: Nightcrawler
plot: When Louis Bloom, a con man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story.

title: Terminator: Dark Fate
plot: An augmented human and Sarah Connor must stop an advanced liquid Terminator from hunting down a young girl, whose fate is critical to the human race.

title: Orphan Black
plot: A streetwise hustler is pulled into a compelling conspiracy after witnessing the suicide of a girl who looks just like her.
A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.

title: Salò, or the 120 Days of Sodom
plot: In World War II Italy, four fascist libertines round up nine adolescent boys and girls and subject them to one hundred and twenty days of physical, mental and sexual torture.

title: Once Upon a Time in America
plot: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

title: City on a Hill
plot: In early 1990s Boston, ADA Decourcy Ward forms an unlikely alliance with a corrupt venerated FBI veteran, Jackie Rohr. Together, they take on a case that changes the city's entire criminal justice system.

title: Devils
plot: A worldwide financial conspiracy is discovered by a group of traders of a large investment bank.
